GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an object containing an array of all topics

topics.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an object containing an array of all articles. Supports filtering and sorting queries.

queries.sort_by: Sorts the articles by any valid column (defaults to created_at). Valid columns: article_id, title, topic, author, created_at, votes, article_img_url, comment_count

queries.order: Orders the results in asc or desc (defaults to desc)

queries.topic: Filters the articles by a specific topic value

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/users.description: serves an object containing an array of users

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a specific article by its ID (includes comment_count, the total number of comments for this article)

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a specific article by its ID, sorted by date in descending order

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to an article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes property of an article by article_id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment by comment_id
